inputs.name: Name
inputs.help_text: Enter a name for the Profiler.

actions.description: Allows the user to upload a fingerprint database file for device profiling.
actions.trigger: Clicking the 'Browse' button and selecting a file.

constraints.description: The uploaded file must be a valid fingerprint database package.

errors.description: An error occurs if the uploaded file is not a valid fingerprint database package.

steps: Navigate to Profiler > Profiler Configuration > Basic Configuration.
Enter a name for the Profiler in the 'Name' field.
Click 'Browse' and upload the device fingerprints package.

image_insights.insights: The configuration screen includes fields for entering a Profiler name and uploading a fingerprint database file. UI elements include tabs, text fields, buttons, and a file upload field.
